backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, customer registration, OTP generation and verification, and admin‑only registration retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend admin files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend registration and admin‑panel files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions using OKLCH color tokens with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component toggling between RegistrationFlow and AdminPanel views.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Full admin panel UI handling authentication, admin status checks, setup code application, registration browsing, and recovery flows.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Card UI for denied‑access state providing admin setup code entry, apply flow, and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: Provides React Query hooks for admin checks, role retrieval, claiming admin access, and fetching registrations or a single registration.
Handles applying an admin setup code, storing it, initializing admin access, and refreshing related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines mutations for generating OTPs, verifying OTPs, and submitting a full registration including document uploads.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Implements the multi-step customer registration UI flow with navigation, state management, and progress handling.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders the customer details form, validates inputs, and reports validity and data upstream.
Manages OTP generation, verification, and final registration submission, showing success when complete.
Displays terms and conditions and notifies when the user accepts them with a timestamp.
React component handling Aadhaar and PAN file uploads, validation, and UI display for the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Exports structured terms and conditions for router usage and service rules.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Defines TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document data, and step props in the registration process.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Provides validation logic for customer details including required fields, phone, age, email, and address checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements authentication context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project's versioned state, goals, architectural notes, issues, and implemented registration-flow features. Highlights a 4‑step registration system, an admin panel requirement, and known admin access bugs.
